name: Local SEO
description: Local SEO is done for businesses like a restaurant or grocery store or supermarket offering services in a particular locality/city. All the content and SEO is driven towards sending client traffic from that particular region/city/area to the clients location.

name: Technical SEO
description: Technical SEO helps search engines find your website with ease. With the right technical SEO, your website loads fast and is easier to use on multiple devices including all handheld devices and mobile phones.

name: Content Marketing & Strategy
description: This entails a strategic marketing approach with a primary focus on attracting and retaining a defined audience. Once the content reaches the relevant audience, a customer action follows and business is ensured.

name: On-Page Optimization
description: We optimize key on-page elements such as title tags, meta descriptions, headings, and content. We implement effective link building strategies to improve your website's authority and credibility
